CareTaxonomy.name: CareTaxonomy
CareTaxonomy.description: Represents a static list of taxonomy codes.

Description.description: The description of the care taxonomy.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date when the care taxonomy is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date when the care taxonomy is no longer effective.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the care taxonomy is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the care taxonomy.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

ParentTaxonomyId.description: The parent care taxonomy associated with the current care taxonomy.

TaxonomyCode.description: The unique code for the care taxonomy.

TaxonomyType.description: The type of the care taxonomy.
